meta.title: Golden Retriever Breed Guide: Personality, Lifespan & Care
meta.description: Everything you need to know about Golden Retrievers. Temperament, shedding, energy levels, and why they are the ultimate family dog.

h1: The Golden Retriever: Friendly, Devoted, and Enthusiastic
short_intro: Golden Retrievers are one of America's most popular dog breeds for a reason. They are intelligent, friendly, and devoted companions that excel as family pets, service dogs, and working partners.
good_fit_if: You want a dog that loves everyone
You are willing to deal with shedding
avoid_if: You are away from home for long periods

personality.title: Golden Retriever Personality
paragraphs: Goldens are known for their gentle and affectionate nature. They are eager to please and highly trainable.
They are generally great with children and other pets, making them ideal family additions.

living_needs.title: Living Needs
paragraphs: Goldens need daily exercise. A fenced yard is great, but daily walks and fetch sessions are essential.
They thrive on human companionship and should live indoors with their family.

time_and_cost.title: Time and Cost
paragraphs: Expect to spend significant time on exercise and grooming.
Costs can be higher due to their size and potential health issues.

lifestyle_summary.title: Is a Golden Retriever Right for You?
paragraphs: If you can provide the love, exercise, and attention they crave, a Golden will be your best friend forever.

cta.quiz_anchor: Not sure if a Golden is right for you? Take our Lifestyle Match Quiz.

quick_answers.question: What is the key takeaway?
quick_answers.answer: This is a sample quick answer for validation purposes.
